name: plane_list_issue_types
description: Get all issue types for a specific project

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project to get issue types for

name: plane_get_issue_type
description: Get details of a specific issue type

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the issue type

type_id.description: The uuid identifier of the issue type to get

name: plane_create_issue_type
description: Create a new issue type in a project

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project to create the issue type in

name: plane_update_issue_type
description: Update an existing issue type

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the issue type

type_id.description: The uuid identifier of the issue type to update

issue_type_data.description: The fields to update on the issue type

name: plane_delete_issue_type
description: Delete an issue type

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the issue type

type_id.description: The uuid identifier of the issue type to delete

name: plane_list_states
description: Get all states for a specific project

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project to get states for

name: plane_get_state
description: Get details of a specific state

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the state

state_id.description: The uuid identifier of the state to get

name: plane_create_state
description: Create a new state in a project

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project to create the state in

name: plane_update_state
description: Update an existing state

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the state

state_id.description: The uuid identifier of the state to update

state_data.description: The fields to update on the state

name: plane_delete_state
description: Delete a state

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the state

state_id.description: The uuid identifier of the state to delete

name: plane_list_labels
description: Get all labels for a specific project

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project to get labels for

name: plane_get_label
description: Get details of a specific label

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the label

label_id.description: The uuid identifier of the label to get

name: plane_create_label
description: Create a new label in a project

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project to create the label in

name: plane_update_label
description: Update an existing label

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the label

label_id.description: The uuid identifier of the label to update

label_data.description: The fields to update on the label

name: plane_delete_label
description: Delete a label

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the label

label_id.description: The uuid identifier of the label to delete

name: plane_get_user
description: Get the current user's information

name: plane_get_workspace_members
description: Get all members in the current workspace

name: plane_get_projects
description: Get all projects for the current user

name: plane_create_project
description: Create a new project

identifier.description: The identifier of the project. This is typically a word of around 5 characters derived from the name of the project in uppercase.

name: plane_list_modules
description: Get all modules for a specific project

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project to get modules for

name: plane_get_module
description: Get details of a specific module

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the module

module_id.description: The uuid identifier of the module to get

name: plane_create_module
description: Create a new module in a project

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project to create the module in

name: plane_update_module
description: Update an existing module

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the module

module_id.description: The uuid identifier of the module to update

module_data.description: The fields to update on the module

name: plane_delete_module
description: Delete a module

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the module

module_id.description: The uuid identifier of the module to delete

name: plane_list_module_issues
description: Get all issues for a specific module

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the module

module_id.description: The uuid identifier of the module to get issues for

name: plane_add_module_issues
description: Add issues to a module. Assign module to issues.

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the module

module_id.description: The uuid identifier of the module to add issues to

issues.description: Array of issue UUIDs to add to the module

name: plane_delete_module_issue
description: Remove an issue from a module. Unassign module from issue.

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the module

module_id.description: The uuid identifier of the module containing the issue

issue_id.description: The uuid identifier of the issue to remove from the module

name: plane_get_issue_using_readable_identifier
description: Get all issues for a specific project. When issue identifier is provided something like FIRST-123, ABC-123, etc. For FIRST-123, project_identifier is FIRST and issue_identifier is 123

project_identifier.description: The readable identifier of the project to get issues for

issue_identifier.description: The identifier of the issue to get

name: plane_get_issue_comments
description: Get all comments for a specific issue. This requests project_id and issue_id as uuid parameters. If you have a readable identifier, you can use the get_issue_using_readable_identifier tool to get the issue_id and project_id

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project to get issues for

issue_id.description: The uuid identifier of the issue to get

name: plane_add_issue_comment
description: Add a comment to a specific issue. This requests project_id and issue_id as uuid parameters. If you have a readable identifier, you can use the get_issue_using_readable_identifier tool to get the issue_id and project_id

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project to get issues for

issue_id.description: The uuid identifier of the issue to get

comment_html.description: The html content of the comment to add

name: plane_create_issue
description: Create an issue. This requests project_id as uuid parameter. If you have a readable identifier for project, you can use the get_projects tool to get the project_id from it

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project to create the issue for

name: plane_update_issue
description: Update an issue. This requests project_id and issue_id as uuid parameters. If you have a readable identifier, you can use the get_issue_using_readable_identifier tool to get the issue_id and project_id

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the issue

issue_id.description: The uuid identifier of the issue to update

issue_data.description: The fields to update on the issue

name: plane_list_cycles
description: Get all cycles for a specific project

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project to get cycles for

name: plane_get_cycle
description: Get details of a specific cycle

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the cycle

cycle_id.description: The uuid identifier of the cycle to get

name: plane_create_cycle
description: Create a new cycle in a project

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project to create the cycle in

end_date.description: The end date of the cycle of format YYYY-MM-DD

start_date.description: The start date of the cycle of format YYYY-MM-DD

cycle_data.description: The data for creating the cycle

name: plane_update_cycle
description: Update an existing cycle

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the cycle

cycle_id.description: The uuid identifier of the cycle to update

end_date.description: The end date of the cycle of format YYYY-MM-DD

start_date.description: The start date of the cycle of format YYYY-MM-DD

cycle_data.description: The fields to update on the cycle

name: plane_delete_cycle
description: Delete a cycle

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the cycle

cycle_id.description: The uuid identifier of the cycle to delete

name: plane_transfer_cycle_issues
description: Transfer issues from one cycle to another

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the cycle

cycle_id.description: The uuid identifier of the source cycle

new_cycle_id.description: The uuid identifier of the target cycle

name: plane_list_cycle_issues
description: Get all issues for a specific cycle

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the cycle

cycle_id.description: The uuid identifier of the cycle to get issues for

name: plane_add_cycle_issues
description: Add issues to a cycle

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the cycle

cycle_id.description: The uuid identifier of the cycle to add issues to

issues.description: Array of issue UUIDs to add to the cycle

name: plane_delete_cycle_issue
description: Remove an issue from a cycle

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the cycle

cycle_id.description: The uuid identifier of the cycle containing the issue

issue_id.description: The uuid identifier of the issue to remove from the cycle

name: plane_get_issue_worklogs
description: Get all worklogs for a specific issue

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the issue

issue_id.description: The uuid identifier of the issue to get worklogs for

name: plane_get_total_worklogs
description: Get total logged time for a project

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project to get total worklogs for

name: plane_create_worklog
description: Create a new worklog for an issue

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the issue

issue_id.description: The uuid identifier of the issue to create worklog for

duration.description: The duration of the worklog in minutes

worklog_data.description: The data for creating the worklog

name: plane_update_worklog
description: Update an existing worklog

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the issue

issue_id.description: The uuid identifier of the issue containing the worklog

worklog_id.description: The uuid identifier of the worklog to update

duration.description: The duration of the worklog in minutes

worklog_data.description: The fields to update on the worklog

name: plane_delete_worklog
description: Delete a worklog

project_id.description: The uuid identifier of the project containing the issue

issue_id.description: The uuid identifier of the issue containing the worklog

worklog_id.description: The uuid identifier of the worklog to delete
